title: To riot, i need assisstance for having to reclaim an old account if possible or to reclaim lost acco
body:
My friend sent me a free rp message and now i cant login. I tried to redo password and now i cant. If its possible for you to help me reclaim my account quote "-snipp-" as username and " --snip--" as summoner name.

If you cant then can this wish come true ik that my old account that im using now use to have alot of games that i left, but now im asking u as my last card. If your able to release my old account that im using,please riot,please i now have lost to much for this account. But if your able to please, can i use my old account once again. Im sorry for all the players i left in those games and now i ask you, will you please release my account.

If its not possible well, i hope that in the future that peoples accounts. I hope this message gets to u (if its possible) but if doesnt well i guess its back to scratch

Sincerly from a gamer,
thewarlord69

replies.body: I edited out your account info for security reasons.  It sounds like you got baited by a phishing attempt, but don't worry!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery can help get you back.  If possible, include the name of the player that messaged you in the ticket so we can look at it.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
